MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Branxton Farm Cottage and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am due to repairs required to our electrical network near the Police Headquarters substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:33am on Sunday, 06 December 2020
